amendment.description: Amendment sought to require GAO to conduct a study of the impact funds awarded through the Prevention and Public Health Fund would have on preventing chronic diseases and promoting health and then to submit a report to Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-61 to require the U.S. Government Accountability Office to conduct a study of the impact funds awarded through the Prevention and Public Health Fund would have on preventing chronic diseases and promoting health.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 261).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 261).
